subject: Hack this!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Gonna replace the tuning cap with varactors and make it a Retro Box.
Oscillator is is 200pf, and the antenna side 450pf, so probably 3 NTE618,
two back to back for the oscillator and one for the antenna tuner.

 F-S
